DOC.brief_summary: In order evaluate late outcome patient curatively treat breast cancer , special outpatient clinic develop . There two main purpose outpatient clinic . The first purpose evaluate result radiation treatment map A ) late toxicity B ) tumour control survival . The second purpose outpatient clinic late outcome also function pilot new CAT ( Computer Assisted Theragnostics , abbreviate CAT project ) multiple late outcome variable record . In pilot want investigate whether physical presence patient outpatient clinic , allow physical examination , add value questionnaire fill patient home . The ultimate aim new CAT project use multicentric data develop model predict oncological outcome late side effect . Insight beneficial adverse effect certain treatment use predictive model , require choose optimal treatment individual patient use share decision make process .
